content: **knitted top in drops belle the piece is worked top down with wave-pattern sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-102 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s/m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-350-400-400 g colour 04 dandelion **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 cm and 80 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch 25 stitches in width and 30 row in height with wave-pattern = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
